description:
With all of the media's attention focused on Egypt, it is easy to forget about other civilizations that are fighting for their freedom.

The people of Bajor are suffering under the cruel hand of oppression.
Their land has been taken over for the purpose of exploiting it's rich mineral deposits.

It is time to put a stop to this barbarity.

Download this app & show your support for the Bajoran people.
If you are so moved, you may also make a donation to the cause.

This app will be named "Kejal" on your device; the Bajoran word for "freedom".
